title: Variables
text: Represent the speeds using variables, Carina's speed as $$x+15$$, the speed of her brother as $$x$$

title: Multiplication
text: Multiply the speed(in variable form) by its respective value.

title: Conversion
text: Now, translate the expressions that were multiplied by their monetary values into a single equation. This will be $$3\left(x+15\right)+4\left(x\right)=395$$

title: Substitution
text: Plug $$x$$ into the original relationship find $$x+15$$.

title: Calculation
text: The answer is $$65$$ mph for Carina and $$50$$ mph for her brother.
